response.overview: What happens when you follow the sound of anklets deep into the forest?  YAKSHI is a spine-chilling horror short film rooted in Indian folklore. When four friends stray into the woods chasing mysterious anklet sounds, they awaken something ancient.  Set in a haunting forest, this horror thriller blends supernatural elements with a chilling atmosphere that keeps you hooked till the very end.
response.tagline: What happens when you follow the sound of anklets deep into the forest?
response.title: Yakshi
